segments.text: What sort of salary did you get at your previous job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . I am sure we can offer you $ 3 , 500 at the beginning . Would that be satisfactory ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I think so . That would be more than I have wished .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good . We also have health insurance , bonus and paid vacation . When can you begin to work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . Please come in on Monday . Working hours are from eight to four-thirty . Lunch is fifty-five minutes .
segments.speaker: S1
